title: FS 1961 Wrigley Field Exhibits complete set of 24 HOFers
author: T206Jim

posts.post_title: FS 1961 Wrigley Field Exhibits complete set of 24 HOFers
posts.post_content:
A complete set of the 1961 Wrigley Field Exhibits which is chock full of, indeed only comprised of, Hall of Famers.  Some have writing on them as shown and a few have the postcard backs.  The two photos of the front and back images are aligned.

$300 shipped.
